section.name: Use Force Field X with Mathematica
section.p: The Force Field X application programming interface (API) is available within Mathematica using JLink.
Force Field X depends on Java version 10 or later. However, the Wolfram Cloud is currently using Java version 8. Thus, please use a local Mathematica installation.
Please download this notebook to run on a local installation of Mathematica. Use of the Wolfram Cloud (via "Make Your Own Copy") is not currently supported.
